content.p: Auto-renewal means that all books you have on loan will be automatically renewed by the system every day unless they have been requested by another library user. Our books/AV items will normally be issued for one week and books in high demand will be issued for two days We will email you to let you know when a requested item is due for return, and if this happens, you will have a maximum of six days to bring it back. Please see our contact page for telephone and email contact points.
